mapper.sql: CORRECT_ID correctId, ITEMINST_ID iteminstId, APPLYINST_ID applyinstId, PROJ_INFO_ID projInfoId, IS_FLOW_TRIGGER isFlowTrigger, APPINST_ID appinstId, CORRECT_DUE_DAYS correctDueDays, CORRECT_DUE_TIME correctDueTime, MATINST_IDS matinstIds, CORRECT_DESC correctDesc, CORRECT_MEMO correctMemo, CHARGE_ORG_ID chargeOrgId, CHARGE_ORG_NAME chargeOrgName, WINDOW_USER_ID windowUserId, WINDOW_USER_NAME windowUserName, WINDOW_PHONE windowPhone, OPS_USER_ID opsUserId, OPS_USER_NAME opsUserName, OPS_TIME opsTime, CORRECT_USER_NAME correctUserName, CORRECT_END_TIME correctEndTime, PRINT_USER_ID printUserId, PRINT_USER_NAME printUserName, PRINT_TIME printTime, CORRECT_STATE correctState, IS_DELETED isDeleted, CREATER creater, CREATE_TIME createTime, MODIFIER modifier, MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, ROOT_ORG_ID rootOrgId

ahic.CORRECT_ID correctId, ahic.ITEMINST_ID iteminstId, ahic.APPLYINST_ID applyinstId, ahic.PROJ_INFO_ID projInfoId, ahic.IS_FLOW_TRIGGER isFlowTrigger, ahic.APPINST_ID appinstId, ahic.CORRECT_DUE_DAYS correctDueDays, ahic.CORRECT_DUE_TIME correctDueTime, ahic.MATINST_IDS matinstIds, ahic.CORRECT_DESC correctDesc, ahic.CORRECT_MEMO correctMemo, ahic.CHARGE_ORG_ID chargeOrgId, ahic.CHARGE_ORG_NAME chargeOrgName, ahic.WINDOW_USER_ID windowUserId, ahic.WINDOW_USER_NAME windowUserName, ahic.WINDOW_PHONE windowPhone, ahic.OPS_USER_ID opsUserId, ahic.OPS_USER_NAME opsUserName, ahic.OPS_TIME opsTime, ahic.CORRECT_USER_NAME correctUserName, ahic.CORRECT_END_TIME correctEndTime, ahic.PRINT_USER_ID printUserId, ahic.PRINT_USER_NAME printUserName, ahic.PRINT_TIME printTime, ahic.CORRECT_STATE correctState, ahic.IS_DELETED isDeleted, ahic.CREATER creater, ahic.CREATE_TIME createTime, ahic.MODIFIER modifier, ahic.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, ahic.ROOT_ORG_ID rootOrgId
mapper.select: select ,ahi.ITEMINST_NAME iteminstName,aha.APPLYINST_CODE applyinstCode,api.PROJ_NAME projInfoName, api.LOCAL_CODE localCode,api.REGIONALISM regionalism,aha.APPLY_SUBJECT applySubject,aha.LINKMAN_INFO_ID linkmanInfoId,ooo.ORG_NAME approveOrgName from AEA_HI_ITEM_CORRECT ahic LEFT JOIN AEA_HI_ITEMINST ahi ON ahi.ITEMINST_ID = ahic.ITEMINST_ID LEFT JOIN OPU_OM_ORG ooo ON ahi.APPROVE_ORG_ID = ooo.ORG_ID LEFT JOIN AEA_HI_APPLYINST aha ON aha.APPLYINST_ID = ahic.APPLYINST_ID LEFT JOIN AEA_PROJ_INFO api ON api.PROJ_INFO_ID = ahic.PROJ_INFO_ID where ahic.CORRECT_ID = #{id} AND ahic.IS_DELETED = '0'
mapper.update:
update AEA_HI_ITEM_CORRECT
CORRECT_ID = #{correctId},
ITEMINST_ID = #{iteminstId},
APPLYINST_ID = #{applyinstId},
PROJ_INFO_ID = #{projInfoId},
IS_FLOW_TRIGGER = #{isFlowTrigger},
APPINST_ID = #{appinstId},
CORRECT_DUE_DAYS = #{correctDueDays},
CORRECT_DUE_TIME = #{correctDueTime},
MATINST_IDS = #{matinstIds},
CORRECT_DESC = #{correctDesc},
CORRECT_MEMO = #{correctMemo},
CHARGE_ORG_ID = #{chargeOrgId},
CHARGE_ORG_NAME = #{chargeOrgName},
WINDOW_USER_ID = #{windowUserId},
WINDOW_USER_NAME = #{windowUserName},
WINDOW_PHONE = #{windowPhone},
OPS_USER_ID = #{opsUserId},
OPS_USER_NAME = #{opsUserName},
OPS_TIME = #{opsTime},
CORRECT_USER_NAME = #{correctUserName},
CORRECT_END_TIME = #{correctEndTime},
PRINT_USER_ID = #{printUserId},
PRINT_USER_NAME = #{printUserName},
PRINT_TIME = #{printTime},
CORRECT_STATE = #{correctState},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted},
CREATER = #{creater},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime},
MODIFIER = #{modifier},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime},
ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId},
where CORRECT_ID = #{correctId}
mapper.select:
select * from( SELECT ahi_123.ITEMINST_ID iteminstId, ahap_123.APPLYINST_CODE applyinstCode, temp1.PROJ_NAME projName, ali_123.LINKMAN_NAME linkmanName, case ahap_123.IS_SERIES_APPROVE WHEN '1' THEN '单项' ELSE '并联' end isSeriesApprove, theme.THEME_NAME themeName, aps_123.STAGE_NAME stageName, ahi_123.ITEMINST_NAME iteminstName, ahap_123.CREATE_TIME createTime, ahic_123.CORRECT_ID correctId FROM AEA_HI_ITEMINST ahi_123 LEFT JOIN AEA_HI_PAR_STAGEINST ahs_123 ON ahi_123.STAGEINST_ID = ahs_123.STAGEINST_ID LEFT JOIN AEA_HI_APPLYINST ahap_123 ON ahs_123.APPLYINST_ID = ahap_123.APPLYINST_ID LEFT JOIN AEA_PAR_STAGE aps_123 ON aps_123.STAGE_ID = ahs_123.STAGE_ID LEFT JOIN AEA_PAR_THEME_VER ver ON aps_123.THEME_VER_ID = ver.THEME_VER_ID LEFT JOIN AEA_LINKMAN_INFO ali_123 ON ali_123.LINKMAN_INFO_ID = ahap_123.LINKMAN_INFO_ID LEFT JOIN AEA_PAR_THEME theme ON theme.THEME_ID = ver.THEME_ID INNER JOIN AEA_HI_ITEM_CORRECT ahic_123 ON ahic_123.APPLYINST_ID = ahap_123.APPLYINST_ID AND ahic_123.ITEMINST_ID = ahi_123.ITEMINST_ID AND ahic_123.CORRECT_STATE = '7' LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ap.APPLYINST_ID, GROUP_CONCAT(p.PROJ_NAME) AS PROJ_NAME FROM aea_applyinst_proj ap LEFT JOIN aea_proj_info p ON ap.proj_info_id = p.proj_info_id GROUP BY ap.APPLYINST_ID ) temp1 ON temp1.APPLYINST_ID = ahap_123.APPLYINST_ID WHERE ahi_123.IS_SERIES_APPROVE = '0' AND ahi_123.ITEMINST_STATE = '7' and ahic_123.ROOT_ORG_ID = #{currentOrgId} and ahic_123.creater = #{currentUserId} UNION SELECT ahi_123.ITEMINST_ID iteminstId, ahap_123.APPLYINST_CODE applyinstCode, temp1.PROJ_NAME projName, ali_123.LINKMAN_NAME linkmanName, case ahap_123.IS_SERIES_APPROVE WHEN '1' THEN '单项' ELSE '并联' end isSeriesApprove, NULL AS themeName, NULL AS stageName, ahi_123.ITEMINST_NAME iteminstName, ahap_123.CREATE_TIME createTime, ahic_123.CORRECT_ID correctId FROM AEA_HI_ITEMINST ahi_123 LEFT JOIN AEA_HI_SERIESINST ahs_123 ON ahi_123.SERIESINST_ID = ahs_123.SERIESINST_ID LEFT JOIN AEA_HI_APPLYINST ahap_123 ON ahs_123.APPLYINST_ID = ahap_123.APPLYINST_ID LEFT JOIN AEA_LINKMAN_INFO ali_123 ON ali_123.LINKMAN_INFO_ID = ahap_123.LINKMAN_INFO_ID INNER JOIN AEA_HI_ITEM_CORRECT ahic_123 ON ahic_123.APPLYINST_ID = ahap_123.APPLYINST_ID AND ahic_123.ITEMINST_ID = ahi_123.ITEMINST_ID AND ahic_123.CORRECT_STATE = '7' LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ap.APPLYINST_ID, GROUP_CONCAT(p.PROJ_NAME) AS PROJ_NAME FROM aea_applyinst_proj ap LEFT JOIN aea_proj_info p ON ap.proj_info_id = p.proj_info_id GROUP BY ap.APPLYINST_ID ) temp1 ON temp1.APPLYINST_ID = ahap_123.APPLYINST_ID WHERE ahi_123.IS_SERIES_APPROVE = '1' AND ahi_123.ITEMINST_STATE = '7' and ahic_123.ROOT_ORG_ID = #{currentOrgId} and ahic_123.creater = #{currentUserId} ) gg
gg.projName like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or gg.isSeriesApprove = #{keyword} or themeName like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
